member.name: M:APITestTask.Controllers.AdPlatformsController.UploadAdPlatforms(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.IFormFile)
member.summary: Upload ad platforms data from a file
member.param: Text file containing ad platform data in format: PlatformName:/location1,/location2

member.name: M:APITestTask.Controllers.AdPlatformsController.UploadAdPlatformsFromContent(System.String)
member.summary: Upload ad platforms data from text content
member.param: Text content with ad platform data in format: PlatformName:/location1,/location2

member.name: M:APITestTask.Controllers.AdPlatformsController.SearchAdPlatforms(System.String)
member.summary: Search for ad platforms available in a specific location
member.returns: List of ad platforms available in the specified location
